languages.text: "Я не могу игнорировать просьбу преподобного и угрозу еретиков на Футфоле. Раз ты не можешь этим заняться, {name}, я отправлюсь в теневые кварталы сама!"
"I cannot ignore Reverend Hieronymus's request or the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't undertake this task, {name}, then I will go to the Shadow Quarters myself!"
languages.original_text: "Я не могу игнорировать просьбу преподобного и угрозу еретиков на Футфоле. Раз ты не можешь этим заняться, {name}, я отправлюсь в теневые кварталы сама!"

traits.locale_text: "I cannot ignore Father Hieronimus's request nor the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't take on this task, {name}, then I will go to the slums myself!"
"I cannot ignore Father Hieronimus's request nor the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't take on this task, {name}, then I will go to the slums myself!"
"I cannot ignore Reverend Hieronymus's request or the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't undertake this task, {name}, then I will go to the Shadow Quarters myself!"
"I cannot ignore Reverend Hieronymus's request or the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't undertake this task, {name}, then I will go to the Shadow Quarters myself!"
"I cannot ignore Reverend Hieronymus's request or the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't undertake this task, {name}, then I will go to the Shadow Quarters myself!"

languages.text: “我不能无视希罗尼穆斯牧师的请求，也不能无视落脚港的异端威胁。如果你无法承担这项任务，{name}，那我就自己去阴影区！”
languages.original_text: "I cannot ignore Reverend Hieronymus's request or the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't undertake this task, {name}, then I will go to the Shadow Quarters myself!"

traits.locale_text: “我不能无视希罗尼穆斯牧师的请求，也不能无视落脚港的异端威胁。如果你无法承担这项任务，{name}，那我就自己去阴影区！”

languages.text: «No puedo ignorar la petición del reverendo Hieronymus ni la amenaza de la herejía que se oculta en Paso. Si no es capaz de cumplir con lo que se le exige, {name}, ¡me encargaré yo misma de ir a los barrios bajos!».
languages.original_text: "I cannot ignore Reverend Hieronymus's request or the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't undertake this task, {name}, then I will go to the Shadow Quarters myself!"

traits.locale_text: «No puedo ignorar la petición del reverendo Hieronymus ni la amenaza de la herejía que se oculta en Paso. Si no es capaz de cumplir con lo que se le exige, {name}, ¡me encargaré yo misma de ir a los barrios bajos!».

languages.text: 「ヒエロニムス司祭の要請やフットフォールの異端の脅威を無視することはできません。{name}様、御身がこの依頼を引き受けられないのであれば、我が自らシャドウクォーターに参ります！」
languages.original_text: "I cannot ignore Reverend Hieronymus's request or the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't undertake this task, {name}, then I will go to the Shadow Quarters myself!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヒエロニムス司祭の要請やフットフォールの異端の脅威を無視することはできません。{name}様、御身がこの依頼を引き受けられないのであれば、我が自らシャドウクォーターに参ります！」
「ヒエロニムス司祭の要請やフットフォールの異端の脅威を無視することはできません。{name}様、御身がこの依頼を引き受けられないのであれば、我が自らシャドウクォーターに参ります！」

languages.text: "Ich kann Reverend Hieronymus' Bitte oder die Bedrohung für Footfall durch Ketzerei nicht ignorieren. Wenn Ihr diese Aufgabe nicht übernehmen könnt, {name}, dann gehe ich selbst in dien Schattenquartiere!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot ignore Reverend Hieronymus's request or the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't undertake this task, {name}, then I will go to the Shadow Quarters myself!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann Reverend Hieronymus' Bitte oder die Bedrohung für Footfall durch Ketzerei nicht ignorieren. Wenn Ihr diese Aufgabe nicht übernehmen könnt, {name}, dann gehe ich selbst in dien Schattenquartiere!"

languages.text: « Je ne peux ignorer la demande du révérend Hiéronymus ou la menace posée par les hérétiques de Castel. Si vous n'êtes pas en mesure de l'aider, {name}, je me rendrai au Quartier des Ombres moi-même ! »
languages.original_text: "I cannot ignore Reverend Hieronymus's request or the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't undertake this task, {name}, then I will go to the Shadow Quarters myself!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux ignorer la demande du révérend Hiéronymus ou la menace posée par les hérétiques de Castel. Si vous n'êtes pas en mesure de l'aider, {name}, je me rendrai au Quartier des Ombres moi-même ! »

languages.text: "Ne Muhterem Hieronymus'un talebini ne de Binliman'daki kâfirlik tehdidini görmezden gelebilirim {name}. Madem görevi üstlenmiyorsun, ben de Gölge Mahalli'ne tek başıma giderim!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot ignore Reverend Hieronymus's request or the threat of heresy on Footfall. If you can't undertake this task, {name}, then I will go to the Shadow Quarters myself!"

traits.locale_text: "Muhterem Hieronymus'un Binliman'daki kâfirlik tehlikesiyle ilgili talebini görmezden gelemem. {name}, eğer bu görevi sen üstlenmeyeceksen Gölge Mahali'ne ben kendim gideceğim!"
